alternativeNames: Vilaviçosa, Carlos M.; Vilavicosa, Carlos M.; Vila-Vicosa, Carlos M.
examples: Quercus x diegoi F.M.Vázquez, Pinto Gomes, Vinagre, Vila-Viçosa in Folia Bot. Extremadur. 8: 95. 2014.
notes: Name appears as Vilavicosa in publication but Vila-Viçosa is correct (from author, DOB also from author)
